content: **crocheted bag in drops safran the piece is worked in the round with lace pattern ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no e-289 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** measurements circumference approx 75 cm = 29 1/2 length without straps approx 42 cm = 16 1/2 straps approx 38 cm = 15» **materials** drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 150 g color 11 strong yellow **crochet gauge** 24 double crochets in width and 13 row in height = 10 x 10 cm = 4 x 4 crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 mm = us c hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm = 4 change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm = 4 change to a smaller hook size
